allSaves.value: +1 to saving throws against emotion effects

description.value:
1 minute (magic, necromancy, primal)

Performed over a creature that has died within the last hour, the line tender gathers the tattered remnants of their line and reweaves them. This requires another creature that loves the dead creature. At the end of this ritual magic, the dead is restored to life. If a creature has not created life since the last time this ability was used, it will fail, but the line tender has the option of allowing the one that loves them to become their parent, causing the target to be instead reincarnated as a hybrid of their original self and the other creature.

Used on a target Struck and damaged by the line tender's arrow attack since the start of its turn, the target must make a @Check[will|dc:36] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and immune to further uses of this ability by this line tender for an hour.

Success The creature is distracted with thoughts of those they may have ever had a passing fancy for, causing them to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of their next turn.

Failure Overwhelming visions flood the creature's mind, inflicting @Damage[(3d6+14)[mental]] damage unless the creature admits their feelings immediately.

Critical Failure As a failure but with double damage and the target becomes slowed 1 until the end of their next turn.

Trigger A creature within 30 feet prevents damage to another or heals another creature.

Effect The line tended draws the threads of connection tighter between the triggering creature and who they are aiding, likely giggling while they do it. For the next hour, the triggering creature is aware if the other creature is harmed or affected by a negative condition and in what form it takes, even if not visible. If the creature being aided suffers in any way that would alert the triggering creature, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

A target living creature within 40 feet must make a @Check[fortitude|dc:36] saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success Putting the creatures organs in not quite the right place, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} until the end of their next turn.

Failure The creature mutates and shifts as the line tender blends their line with countless others. They remain deformed until their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} is removed.

Critical Failure As a failure, but the creature remains physically altered permanently unless other means are used to address it.
